divs: Sighting DetailsI initially witnessed these same objects on July 4, 2010 and so decided to see if I could see any on this night. Indeed, after about 30 minutes I observed a bright star-like object move in a random pattern across the sky. Several more followed from almost every direction possible over a period of approx 2 hrs for a total of 8 objects. However, two significant events occurred. The first being when several objects in the sky began to flash (white light) from different points in the sky, as if it were a form of communication? The second when one of these objects emitted a bright flash, directly east from it appeared as if something exploded as there were two bright flashes which lingered momentarily prior to fading. I was excited yesterday, as was my family. Now, it's overwhelming, this is not anything I expected or feel comfortable with, it's difficult to explain - just crazy but I know what I saw and I'm more than concerned and this is out of my element. I'm reporting it because I know it has to be impossible that someone else would NOT have seen it too! I do not have a high powered camera but did catch something odd on camera, I don't expect it to be a bombshell but at this point who the heck knows
Summary: Several objects seen over Naugatuck Valley.
